Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires the disposal of copies of identification documents
Summary: Requires the disposal of copies of identification documents by owner, lessee, proprietor or manager of any hotel, motel, steamboat, tourist cabins, camp, resort, tavern, inn, boarding or lodging house.
LawCode: Add ยง209-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring the disposal of copies of identification documents
